data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Just relax; it's only a game and you're only a beginner. Don't ____ about ____ or ____ you're ____ improving ____ enough. Your ____ is ____ extension ____ your ____ and ____ at ____ time ____ each ____. Tensing up will only cause you to lose even when you don't have to.
data.partBlankContent: Just relax; it's only a game and you're only a beginner. Don't wo___ about win____ or i_ you're n__ improving fa__ enough. Your ga__ is a_ extension o_ your perso______ and emo____ at t__ time o_ each mo__. Tensing up will only cause you to lose even when you don't have to.
data.fullContent: Just relax; it's only a game and you're only a beginner. Don't worry about winning or if you're not improving fast enough. Your game is an extension of your personality and emotion at the time of each move. Tensing up will only cause you to lose even when you don't have to.
data.answer: 只是放松；这只是一个游戏，你只是一个初学者。不要担心赢球或者你进步得不够快。你的游戏是你的个性和情感在每一步的延伸。紧张只会让你在不必要的时候输掉比赛。
